Description: FREE SHIPPING TO THE "LOWER 48"!CHECK OUT OUR SUPERB FEEDBACK FOR YOURSELF!CALL FOR A HANDS ON DESCRIPTION OF ALL OF OUR INSTRUMENTS!Guitars West, Inc. For that goth in your life, we have the perfect thing! This is our OLP Coffin guitar with satin-lined coffin case. This is a Basswood body, Maple-necked double cutaway gem. The guitar is in excellent condition, with the plastic still covering the humbucking pickups and coffin-shaped back plate. Coffin inlays decorate the 22 fret Rosewood fretboard. The OLP Coffin guitar has a Tune-o-Matic Vibrato bridge (trem arm not pictured but included), independent Tone & Volume knobs and three-way selector switch. The guitar weighs 6lbs 7oz, with a nut width of 1 11/16" and fretboard radius of 10"In our 30+ years of business, Customer Service has always been of the utmost importance to us. Every call, email and inquiry will be answered. We are happy to offer full descriptions of condition and sound of all of our instruments to the best of our expertise. Title: OLP Coffin Guitar in Matte Satin Black with Coffin Case
